ForearmsSLGripPlateLoaded.name: Sled Grip (plate loaded)
ForearmsSLGripPlateLoaded.preparation: Bend over and grasp bar grips with both hands fingers under lower bar and base of thumbs over top stationary bar.
ForearmsSLGripPlateLoaded.execution: Squeeze bar grips together until lower bar makes contact with upper bar. Release to original position and repeat.
ForearmsSLGripPlateLoaded.comments: Also see muscles for finger articulations and thumb articulations.

ForearmsSLOneHandGripPlateLoaded.name: Sled One Hand Grip (plate loaded)
ForearmsSLOneHandGripPlateLoaded.preparation: Bend over and grasp bar grips with one hand fingers under lower bar and base of thumb over top stationary bar.
ForearmsSLOneHandGripPlateLoaded.execution: Squeeze bar grips together until lower bar makes contact with upper bar. Release to original position and repeat.
ForearmsSLOneHandGripPlateLoaded.comments: See exercise on alternative machine. Also see muscles for finger articulations and thumb articulations.

ForearmsSLOneHandPinchGripPL.name: Sled One Hand Pinch Grip (plate loaded)
ForearmsSLOneHandPinchGripPL.preparation: Place hand around horizontal surfaces fingers along lower surface and thumb on upper surface.
ForearmsSLOneHandPinchGripPL.execution: Pinch surfaces together until lower part makes contact with upper part. Release to original position or just before surfaces become too far apart. Repeat.
ForearmsSLOneHandPinchGripPL.comments: Also see muscles for finger articulations and thumb articulations.
